com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.burstly.video
Class VideoCache

java.lang.Object
  com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.burstly.video.VideoCache
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICache<String>, IResourse<String>, ServerConfigurationService.IServerConfigurable
public final class VideoCache
extends Object
implements ICache<String>, ServerConfigurationService.IServerConfigurable

This cache caches Video ads files. Generally is used by native Burstly ads.

          Is notified when url starts downloading url.
